antDesign.notes: Using Ant Design v5 with design tokens via ConfigProvider

tailwindcss.overlap: HIGH - Competes with Ant Design for styling primitives, spacing, colors

framer-motion.overlap: MEDIUM - Ant Design has built-in motion tokens

@radix-ui/react-slider.overlap: HIGH - Ant Design has Slider component

cssApproach.notes: Mixed approach - Tailwind utilities + Ant components creates inconsistency

chartingLibraries.notes: Could leverage Ant Design Charts if available

risks: Tailwind CSS extensively used alongside Ant Design creates inconsistent spacing/sizing
Lucide icons used instead of standardizing on @ant-design/icons
React Hook Form used instead of Ant Design Form in some places
Radix UI Slider used instead of Ant Design Slider
Multiple animation systems (Framer Motion vs Ant Design motion tokens)
recommendations: Consolidate to Ant Design components where possible
Remove or minimize Tailwind usage in favor of Ant Design utilities
Leverage Ant Design motion tokens instead of Framer Motion
